member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat.DateTimeStyles

summary.vsli:raw: Gets or sets the formatting options that customize string parsing for some date and time parsing methods.

member.summary: 获取或设置格式设置选项，这些选项可自定义许多日期和时间分析方法的字符串分析方法。

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat.FormatProvider

summary.vsli:raw: Gets an object that controls formatting.

member.summary: 获取控制格式设置的对象。

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat.FormatString

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the format strings to control the formatting produced when a date or time is represented as a string.

member.summary: 当一个日期或时间被表示成字符串时，获取控制格式生成的格式字符串。

returns.vsli:raw: The format strings to control the formatting produced when a date or time is represented as a string.

member.returns: 当一个日期或时间被表示成字符串时控制格式生成的格式字符串。

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Serialization.EmitTypeInformation.Never

member.summary: 从不发出类型信息。

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer

summary.vsli:raw: Serializes objects to the JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) and deserializes JSON data to objects. This class cannot be inherited.

member.summary: 将对象序列化为 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON)，并将 JSON 数据反序列化为对象。 此类不能被继承。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.#ctor(System.Type)

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer" /> class to serialize or deserialize an object of the specified type.

member.summary: 初始化 类的新实例，以便序列化或反序列化指定类型的对象。

param.name: type
param.vsli:raw: The type of the instances that is serialized or deserialized.

member.param: 序列化或反序列化的实例的类型。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.#ctor(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Type})

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer" /> class to serialize or deserialize an object of the specified type, with a collection of known types that may be present in the object graph.

member.summary: 初始化 类的新实例，以便序列化或反序列化指定类型的对象以及可在对象图中呈现的已知类型的集合。

param.name: type
param.vsli:raw: The type of the instances that are serialized or deserialized.

member.param: 序列化或反序列化的实例的类型。

param.name: knownTypes
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains the types that may be present in the object graph.

member.param: 的一个 ，其中包含可在对象图中呈现的类型。

param.vsli:raw: The type of the instances that is serialized or deserialized.

member.param: JSON 序列化程序序列化程序设置。

param.vsli:raw: The name of the XML element that encloses the content to serialize or deserialize.

summary.vsli:raw: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer" /> class to serialize or deserialize an object of a specified type using the XML root element specified by a parameter, with a collection of known types that may be present in the object graph.

param.name: knownTypes
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1" /> of <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that contains the types that may be present in the object graph.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.IgnoreExtensionDataObject

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a value that specifies whether unknown data is ignored on deserialization and whether the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject" /> interface is ignored on serialization.

member.summary: 获取一个值，指定在反序列化时是否忽略未知数据以及在序列化时是否忽略 接口。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to ignore unknown data and <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.IExtensibleDataObject" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 若要忽略未知数据和 ，则为 ；否则为 。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.IsStartObject(System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader)

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> is positioned over an XML element that represents an object the serializer can deserialize from.

member.summary: 获取一个值，指定 是否定位在 XML 元素上，而该元素表示序列化程序可从中进行反序列化的对象。

param.name: reader
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> used to read the XML stream mapped from JSON.

member.param: 用于读取从 JSON 映射的 XML 流的 。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if the reader is positioned correctly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 如果正确定位了读取器，则为 ；否则为 。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.IsStartObject(System.Xml.XmlReader)

summary.vsli:raw: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> is positioned on an object that can be deserialized.

member.summary: 确定是否将 定位在可反序列化的对象上。

param.name: reader
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> used to read the XML stream.

member.param: 用于读取 XML 流的 。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> if the reader is positioned correctly; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 如果正确定位了读取器，则为 ；否则为 。

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.KnownTypes

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a collection of types that may be present in the object graph serialized using this instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer" />.

member.summary: 获取一个类型集合，这些类型可能出现在使用此 实例序列化的对象图中。

returns.vsli:raw: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> that contains the expected types passed in as known types to the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer" /> constructor.

member.returns: 一个 ，它包含作为已知类型传入 构造函数的预期类型。

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph

summary.vsli:raw: Gets the maximum number of items in an object graph that the serializer serializes or deserializes in one read or write call.

member.summary: 获取序列化程序通过一次读取或写入调用在对象图中序列化或反序列化的最大项数。

returns.vsli:raw: The maximum number of items to serialize or deserialize.

member.returns: 要序列化或反序列化的最大项数。

exception.vsli:raw: The number of items exceeds the maximum value.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.ReadObject(System.IO.Stream)

summary.vsli:raw: Reads a document stream in the JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) format and returns the deserialized object.

member.summary: 以 JSON（JavaScript 对象表示法）格式读取文档流，并返回反序列化的对象。

param.name: stream
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to be read.

member.param: 要读取的 。

returns.vsli:raw: The deserialized object.

member.returns: 反序列化的对象。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.ReadObject(System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader)

summary.vsli:raw: Reads the XML document mapped from JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> and returns the deserialized object.

member.summary: 使用 读取从 JSON（JavaScript 对象表示法）映射的 XML 文档，并返回反序列化的对象。

param.name: reader
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> used to read the XML document mapped from JSON.

member.param: 一个用于读取从 JSON 映射的 XML 文档的。

returns.vsli:raw: The deserialized object.

member.returns: 反序列化的对象。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.ReadObject(System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader,System.Boolean)

summary.vsli:raw: Reads the XML document mapped from JSON with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> and returns the deserialized object; it also enables you to specify whether the serializer should verify that it is positioned on an appropriate element before attempting to deserialize.

member.summary: 使用 读取从 JSON 映射的 XML 文档并返回反序列化的对象；它还可用于指定序列化程序在尝试反序列化之前是否应验证其定位在相应的元素上。

param.name: reader
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> used to read the XML document mapped from JSON.

member.param: 一个用于读取从 JSON 映射的 XML 文档的。

param.name: verifyObjectName
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to check whether the enclosing XML element name and namespace correspond to the expected name and namespace; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> to skip the verification. The default is <see langword="true" />.

member.param: 若要检查包含的 XML 元素名称和命名空间是否对应于预期的名称和命名空间，则为 ；否则为 以跳过验证。 默认值为 。

returns.vsli:raw: The deserialized object.

member.returns: 反序列化的对象。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.ReadObject(System.Xml.XmlReader)

summary.vsli:raw: Reads the XML document mapped from JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> and returns the deserialized object.

member.summary: 使用 读取从 JSON（JavaScript 对象表示法）映射的 XML 文档，并返回反序列化的对象。

param.name: reader
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> used to read the XML document mapped from JSON.

member.param: 一个用于读取从 JSON 映射的 XML 文档的。

returns.vsli:raw: The deserialized object.

member.returns: 反序列化的对象。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.ReadObject(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Boolean)

summary.vsli:raw: Reads an XML document mapped from JSON with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> and returns the deserialized object; it also enables you to specify whether the serializer should verify that it is positioned on an appropriate element before attempting to deserialize.

member.summary: 使用 读取从 JSON 映射的 XML 文档并返回反序列化的对象；它还可用于指定序列化程序在尝试反序列化之前是否应验证其定位在相应的元素上。

param.name: reader
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> used to read the XML document mapped from JSON.

member.param: 一个 ，用于读取从 JSON 映射的 XML 文档。

param.name: verifyObjectName
param.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to check whether the enclosing XML element name and namespace correspond to the expected name and namespace; otherwise, <see langword="false" />, which skips the verification. The default is <see langword="true" />.

member.param: 若要检查包含的 XML 元素名称和命名空间是否对应于预期的名称和命名空间，则为 ；否则为 以跳过验证。 默认值为 。

returns.vsli:raw: The deserialized object.

member.returns: 反序列化的对象。

member.summary: 获取或设置指定是否序列化只读类型的值。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to serialize read only types; otherwise <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 仅序列化读取类型，则为 ；否则 。

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.UseSimpleDictionaryFormat

summary.vsli:raw: Gets a value that specifies whether to use a simple dictionary format.

member.summary: 获取指定是否使用简单字典格式的值。

returns.vsli:raw: <see langword="true" /> to use a simple dictionary format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.

member.returns: 使用简单的字典格式，则为 ；否则为 。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.WriteEndObject(System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter)

summary.vsli:raw: Writes the closing XML element to an XML document, using an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />, which can be mapped to JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

member.summary: 使用 将结束 XML 元素写入可映射到 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 的 XML 文档。

param.name: writer
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> used to write the XML document to map to JSON.

member.param: 用于写入要映射到 JSON 的 XML 文档的 。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.WriteEndObject(System.Xml.XmlWriter)

summary.vsli:raw: Writes the closing XML element to an XML document, using an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />, which can be mapped to JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

member.summary: 使用 将结束 XML 元素写入可映射到 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 的 XML 文档。

param.name: writer
param.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> used to write the XML document mapped to JSON.

member.param: 用于写入映射到 JSON 的 XML 文档的 。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.WriteObject(System.IO.Stream,System.Object)

summary.vsli:raw: Serializes a specified object to JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) data and writes the resulting JSON to a stream.

member.summary: 将指定对象序列化为 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 数据，并将生成的 JSON 写入流中。

param.name: stream
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that is written to.

member.param: 用于写入 。

param.name: graph
param.vsli:raw: The object that contains the data to write to the stream.

member.param: 包含要写入流的数据的对象。

exception.vsli:raw: The type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules. For example, the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute" /> attribute has not been applied to the type.

member.exception: 正在序列化的类型不符合数据协定规则。 例如， 特性未应用于该类型。

exception.vsli:raw: There is a problem with the instance being written.

member.exception: 正在写入的实例出现问题。

exception.vsli:raw: The maximum number of objects to serialize has been exceeded. Check the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph" /> property.

member.exception: 已超出要序列化的对象的最大数量。 请检查 属性。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.WriteObject(System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter,System.Object)

summary.vsli:raw: Serializes an object to XML that may be mapped to JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). Writes all the object data, including the starting XML element, content, and closing element, with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" />.

member.summary: 将对象序列化为可映射到 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 的 XML。 使用 写入所有对象数据（包括开始 XML 元素、内容和结束元素）。

param.name: writer
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> used to write the XML document or stream to map to JSON.

member.param: 用于写入要映射到 JSON 的 XML 文档或流的 。

param.name: graph
param.vsli:raw: The object that contains the data to write.

member.param: 包含要写入的数据的对象。

exception.vsli:raw: The type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules. For example, the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute" /> attribute has not been applied to the type.

member.exception: 正在序列化的类型不符合数据协定规则。 例如， 特性未应用于该类型。

exception.vsli:raw: There is a problem with the instance being written.

member.exception: 正在写入的实例出现问题。

exception.vsli:raw: The maximum number of objects to serialize has been exceeded. Check the <see cref="P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer.MaxItemsInObjectGraph" /> property.

member.exception: 已超出要序列化的对象的最大数量。 请检查 属性。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonSerializer.WriteObject(System.Xml.XmlWriter,System.Object)

summary.vsli:raw: Serializes an object to XML that may be mapped to JavaScript Object Notation (JSON). Writes all the object data, including the starting XML element, content, and closing element, with an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" />.

member.summary: 将对象序列化为可映射到 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 的 XML。 使用 写入所有对象数据（包括开始 XML 元素、内容和结束元素）。

param.name: writer
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> used to write the XML document to map to JSON.

member.param: 用于写入要映射到 JSON 的 XML 文档的 。

param.name: graph
param.vsli:raw: The object that contains the data to write.

member.param: 包含要写入的数据的对象。

exception.vsli:raw: The type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules. For example, the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractAttribute" /> attribute has not been applied to the type.

member.exception: 正在序列化的类型不符合数据协定规则。 例如， 特性未应用于该类型。

exception.vsli:raw: There is a problem with the instance being written.

member.exception: 正在写入的实例出现问题。

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory

summary.vsli:raw: Produces instances of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> that can read data encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) from a stream or buffer and map it to an XML Infoset and instances of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryWriter" /> that can map an XML Infoset to JSON and write JSON-encoded data to a stream.

member.summary: 生成 实例和 实例，前者可以从流或缓冲区中读取 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 编码数据，并将其映射到 XML Infoset；后者可以将 XML Infoset 映射到 JSON，并将 JSON 编码数据写入流中。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonReader(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Text.Encoding,System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas,System.Xml.OnXmlDictionaryReaderClose)

summary.vsli:raw: Creates an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> that can map buffers encoded with JavaScript Object Notation (JSON), with a specified size and offset and character encoding, to an XML Infoset.

member.summary: 创建一个 ，它可以将 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 编码缓冲区（具有指定大小、偏移量和字符编码）映射到 XML Infoset。

param.name: buffer
param.vsli:raw: The input <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> buffer array from which to read.

member.param: 要从中读取数据的输入 缓冲区数组。

param.name: offset
param.vsli:raw: Starting position from which to read in <paramref name="buffer" />.

member.param: 中开始读取数据的位置。

param.name: count
param.vsli:raw: Number of bytes that can be read from <paramref name="buffer" />.

member.param: 可以从 中读取的字节数。

param.name: encoding
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoding" /> that specifies the character encoding used by the reader. If <see langword="null" /> is specified as the value, the reader attempts to auto-detect the encoding.

member.param: 指定读取器使用的字符编码的 。 如果指定 作为值，读取器将尝试自动检测编码。

param.name: quotas
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas" /> used to prevent Denial of Service attacks when reading untrusted data.

member.param: 用于防止在读取不受信任数据时受到拒绝服务攻击的 。

param.name: onClose
param.vsli:raw: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.OnXmlDictionaryReaderClose" /> delegate to call when the reader is closed. The default value is <see langword="null" />.

member.param: 在读取器关闭时调用的 委托。 默认值为 。

returns.vsli:raw: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlDictionaryReader" /> that can read JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

member.returns: 一个可读取 JavaScript 对象表示法 (JSON) 的 。

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.JsonReaderWriterFactory.CreateJsonWriter(System.IO.Stream,System.Text.Encoding,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.String)

param.name: encoding

param.name: ownsStream
param.vsli:raw: If <see langword="true" />, the output stream is closed by the writer when done; otherwise <see langword="false" />. The default value is <see langword="true" />.
